_A_INPUT_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The AInput component provides data input functionality with support for various data types such as text, password, number, email, and others. The component supports icon display, a clear button, and the ability to show/hide the password.
_A_INPUT_GROUP_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION_: This example shows how to use an input field with the type password and the ability to toggle password visibility using show-password. In the first field, the user can switch between showing and hiding the password, while in the second field this feature is disabled.
_A_INPUT_PROPS_ICON_PREPEND_DESCRIPTION_: Specifies the icon that will be displayed before the input field. This icon can be used to enhance the visual perception or indicate the type of input data.
_A_INPUT_PROPS_SHOW_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Works when the input type is password. Allows toggling the visibility of the entered password, giving the user the option to see the password being typed.
_A_INPUT_PROPS_STEP_DESCRIPTION_: Used for number or integer types. Specifies the step for changing the value, for example, when increasing or decreasing the number using keyboard arrows.
_A_INPUT_PROPS_TYPE_DESCRIPTION_: Defines the type of input value. Various data types are supported, such as text, password, number, integer, email, and others.
